title: Five-Star Country NSW Cottage Retreat for Eight People
description: If you’re planning the perfect rural escape, look no further than Evanslea Luxury Boutique Accommodation in Mudgee. This charming cottage retreat for eight people is close to amazing wineries, great restaurants and breathtaking scenery - ensuring endless activities for families or those travelling with friends. Your stay on this five-star, four and a half-acre property includes a delicious breakfast hamper, a bottle of wine on arrival and a guaranteed late 12pm checkout.
location_description: Evanslea Luxury Boutique Accommodation (DO NOT USE)

title: Romantic Cottage Getaway in Country NSW
description: If you’re planning a special getaway, look no further than Evanslea Luxury Boutique Accommodation in Mudgee. This region is home to amazing wineries, great restaurants and breathtaking scenery, making it perfect for a rural escape. Evanslea boasts lots of amazing options for couples and groups, so whether you’re taking your partner on a romantic retreat or travelling with friends, you’ll love your cosy cottage accommodation. Includes a delicious breakfast hamper, tasting plate of local cheeses, a bottle of wine on arrival and a guaranteed late checkout.

title: Brand-New Central NSW Wine Country Glamping with Daily Breakfast & Dining Credit
description:
Breathe in the fresh air of New South Wales’ wine country at this brand-new glamping stay within Parklands Resort Mudgee. Elevated luxury sets these immaculate tents apart from your average camping experience - think four-poster beds, polished designer furnishings, a lantern-lit verandah and a sleek ensuite, all with access to the resort's exquisite facilities.

Surrounded by 30 acres of meticulously landscaped gardens, the resort is the ultimate base from which to enjoy Mudgee’s historic food and wine region. Often dubbed Australia’s best-kept secret, the region captivates visitors with its flourishing vineyards and native produce, all just a 3.5-hour drive from Sydney. 

Sample delectable local wine varietals at Vine Restaurant & Bar, adventure through expansive nature reserves or take a relaxing dip in the resort’s indoor pool and bubbling spa. To get the heart rate up, stop by the tennis court or the well-equipped gym, and cap the evenings off with a stroll through the resort's breathtaking grounds.
offer_address: 121 Ulan Road, Putta Bucca, New South Wales 2850, Australia

title: Central NSW Wine Country Escape in Mudgee with Daily Breakfast & Dining Credit
description:
Breathe in the fresh country air with a charming sojourn in central New South Wales' wine country at Parklands Resort & Conference Centre. Surrounded by 30 acres of meticulously landscaped gardens, the resort is the ultimate base from which to enjoy Mudgee's historic food and wine region. Often dubbed Australia’s best-kept secret, the region captivates visitors with its flourishing vineyards and native produce, all just a 3.5-hour drive from Sydney. Sample delectable local wine varietals, adventure through expansive nature reserves or take a relaxing dip in the resort's indoor swimming pool and bubbling spa.

From delicious breakfast buffets to indulgent dinners, get comfortable at Vine Restaurant & Bar, the resort's onsite eatery, which uses locally sourced ingredients to complement exceptional drops from surrounding wineries. Beyond gastronomic delights, the resort's enchanting rose gardens offer a romantic backdrop to a relaxing stroll, the sumptuous rooms are havens of tranquillity and the friendly staff reflect Mudgee's welcoming community, ensuring you feel at home.
offer_address: 121 Ulan Road, Putta Bucca, New South Wales 2850, Australia
